title: Fungus
data:
{{version029}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Fungi''' are harmless, stationary monsters similar to [[plant]]s. Like plants, they wither and quickly die when damaged by any attack.

[[File:Fungus.png]] [[File:Fungus2.png]] [[File:Fungus3.png]] [[File:Fungus4.png]] [[File:Fungus5.png]] [[File:Fungus6.png]] [[File:Fungus7.png]] [[File:Fungus8.png]] [[File:Fungus9.png]]

==Tips & Ticks==
*Prior to [[0.28]], fungi, as a plant-type monster, had negative energy immunity.
*Prior to [[0.26]], fungi did not wither when damaged, but had much less health.
*Prior to [[0.24]], followers of [[Fedhas Madash]] could evolve fungi into [[wandering mushroom]]s.
*Prior to [[0.10]] and [[0.11]], fungi could be used to [[victory dance|easily apply skill points]] or identify weapons.
